Title: Scottish Thistle Pocket Watch

POCKET WATCH in presentation box. Made of fine pewter. Opens on both sides to reveal a Roman numeral dial one side and the clock workings on the other. This pocket watch ishand built by in the U.K. Each timepiece is hand wound and with each gentle hand wind running for 24 hours. (Watch must not be over wound.) There areseventeenprecious stones that aid the movement of this fine watch. These jewels are visible when itis open. A stunning keepsake perfect for a truly unusual gift!
